name: golf-putting-speed-trainer
description: A Progressive Web App (PWA) that utilizes TensorFlow.js to analyze and measure the speed of golf putts through real-time ball tracking.

references.title: Golf Ball Tracking and Speed Detection
references.description: A project focused on tracking and calculating the speed of a golf putt using computer vision techniques.

references.title: Golf Ball Detection and Tracking Based on Convolutional Neural Networks
references.description: A thesis discussing real-time detection and tracking of a golf ball using convolutional neural networks and Kalman filters.

references.title: Doodle Recognition PWA with TensorFlow.js
references.description: An example of a Progressive Web App utilizing TensorFlow.js for in-browser image recognition.

references.title: Golf Ball Detection Model on Roboflow Universe
references.description: A pre-trained golf ball detection model that can be utilized for object detection tasks.

references.title: TensorFlow.js Demos
references.description: A collection of live demos built with TensorFlow.js showcasing various applications.

tasks.title: Set Up Project Structure
tasks.description: Initialize the project with the necessary directories and files for a PWA using TensorFlow.js.

tasks.title: Integrate TensorFlow.js
tasks.description: Incorporate TensorFlow.js into the project to enable in-browser machine learning capabilities.

tasks.title: Develop Ball Detection Model
tasks.description: Train or utilize an existing model to detect and track the golf ball in real-time.

tasks.title: Implement Speed Calculation
tasks.description: Calculate the speed of the golf ball based on its movement across frames.

tasks.title: Design User Interface
tasks.description: Create an intuitive UI for users to record putts, view analyses, and access other features.
